_sText:
Welcome to mg train assault !!!

Gameplay:

There is an attack team and a defense team. 
The attack team must hacking a button to open the train door and capture the train.
The Defense team must defense the train for 5 minutes to win the round.
After each round the teams will change sides.


About the map: 

-Respawn Script for respawning after death

-No Buyzone, but you can find weapons with respawn

-Pickups: Health Kits, Mega Health Kits and Speed Boost

-Unreal Tournament music

-Inspired by Unreal Tournament


SCRIPT
***********
Required plugin for Train Assault Map. The plugin controls the respawn of the players and the team switch on the end of the round.

REQUIREMENTS FOR PLAY WITH RESPAWN SCRIPT !!!
************
- Sourcemod 1.3+ 
- Requirement for Sourcemod: Metamod:Source 1.8+ Download Link ---) (www.sourcemod.net)


Have Fun !!!
